page.title: 04E.R.N.I.E. LIVES HERE.
page.content:
On Preston New Road in Marton is the {Stocks and Bonds Office,}the H.Q. of the government body dealing with these forms of National Savings.The very extensive,tall,concrete building, with the look of a giant mushroom, replaced an earlier building in Lytham. Computers play an important role in the everyday work there and the Computer Centre houses an ICL 2976 computer with a core storage capacity of approx. 6 million bytes.
The Premium Savings Bond Scheme is the central feature of the work undertaken here.Much of this work is done by {E.R.N.I.E.(Electronic Random Number {Indicator Equipment)}This highly sophisticated instrument is a separate entity from the main computer and it is used to produce lists of Bond Numbers for the {Prize Draws}.
